doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Samir Majumder
doctor.specialty: Chest Diseases, Asthma & Respiratory Medicine Specialist
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Samir Majumder is a Chest Diseases Specialist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, MD (CHEST). He is a Former Professor & Head, Respiratory Medicine at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Samir Majumder at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi is 6pm to 10pm (Sat to Thu), 11am to 2pm (Friday).
